title: Download Problems
body: So my friend is trying to download league and he is getting extremely low download speed set to take 17 days to finish. It is not his internet or computer he gets 12 mb/s on other games downloading. Please help

replies.body: It sounds like you friend's network is having a hard time getting a strong signal from our servers. It doesn't mean his internet is bad, it just means it's having a hard time specifically connecting to our servers likely due to how your ISP is routing your connection. Take a bit to run him through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make a few updates to his network, and let me know if that helps.
Try going to League installation folder, right click "lol.launcher.exe" or "LeagueClient.exe" and try running as administrator.
